puissance4.bean

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • puissance4.bean.Message

  • public class Message
extends java.lang.Object
    Class allowing creation of Message objects which are exchanged between players.

      • Message

        public Message()

      • Message

        public Message(int un_colIndex,
               int un_rowIndex,
               java.lang.String un_imagePath,
               java.lang.String un_victoryColor,
               java.lang.String un_pseudo)
        Constructor with parameters for Message class.
        Parameters:
        un_colIndex - Game grid column index just modified.
        un_rowIndex - Game grid row index just modified.
        un_imagePath - Path to the picture we have to display.
        un_victoryColor - Return from the checkVictory function.
        un_pseudo - Pseudo of the player sending the message.
